text: Timothy Vincent Johnson (July 23, 1946 â€“ May 9, 2022) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the U.S. representative for from 2001 to 2013. He was a member of the Republican Party. He did not run for re-election in 2012. He was also a member of the Illinois House of Representatives from 1977 until 2001. He was born in Champaign, Illinois. Johnson died on May 9, 2022 in Urbana, Illinois at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Lawyers from Illinois Category:People from Champaign, Illinois Category:People from Urbana, Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly
title: Tim Johnson (Illinois politician)
